As per CCS (Leave) Rules, 1972 it is stipulated that no member of staff should leave the HQ without the permission of the controlling officer: Further, as per CCS (Conduct) Rules, 1964 it is implied that Government Servant is required to take permission for leaving his Station/ Headquarters. 3 All officers and employees of NHAI are hereby directed to seek permission of their controlling officer before leaving their Station/ Headquarters officer or employee violating these instructions will be liable to disciplinary action.
